keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green MPs will campaign for a minimum wage of £7 an hour to ensure our workers can live decently.
Green MPs would block the selloffs or cuts threatened by the other parties.
Green Energy Greens will deliver thousands of new jobs in construction, engineering and other high tech sectors.
The Greens propose to stop both ID cards and the costly 'database state' that goes with them.
A practical response to climate change and energy crisis, creating jobs across the economy.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Patrick Harvie MSP, Elaine Smith, Labour candidate

issues.economy: Creating jobs across the economy, delivering thousands of new jobs in construction, engineering and other high tech sectors.
issues.environment: A practical response to climate change, creating thousands of new jobs in the green energy sector.

housing.content: The experience of being an MSP is not easily come by and is invaluable to the fine print of politics, especially when it comes to core areas of housing and planning.

leaflet.personalStatement: Experience of being an MSP, helping in school community councils, and working on our family farm have given me vital skills.
leaflet.additionalNotes: If you require a copy of this publication in an alternative format, please get in touch.
